title: How to get free internet at home without activating my modem with a company - Quora

response.answer_text: Ask someone else to pay for your internet insteadAs a neighbour if you can use their WiFiAsk a neighbour if you can run a CAT5 cable into their house.Use mobile or satellite data instead of a fixed line modemEncourage your local government to create a ‘free’ municipal WiFi system (I say ‘free’ as it has to be paid for somehow, by raising taxes)

There ain’t no such thing as free Internet, either you steal it from someone like your neighbor(illegal) or you pay for it,either directly to a company or indirectly in the form of taxes to that so called free Internet the city installed in your neighborhood. Stop being so cheap!!!!!
